languages.text: Богадельни, развернутые по приказу Вольного Торговца, спасали от смерти голодных и лишенных крова. К сожалению, они же нарушили хрупкую экосистему станции — более не вымерзающая в пустых отсеках и не терзаемая эпидемиями нищета расползлась по Футфолу, став рассадником преступности — диких банд анверов, торговцев органами, нелегальных мастеров аугментов.
languages.translation_comment: Повелели изменить жизнь на Футфоле в хоуп

languages.text: Poorhouses opened by the order of the Rogue Trader saved many hungry and homeless from death. Unfortunately, this disrupted the station's delicate ecosystem. No longer freezing to death in empty compartments or tormented by epidemics, those who lived in poverty on Footfall began to choke the station, leading to a sharp rise in crime: organ traders, illegal augmetic specialists, and savage gangs of Anvers proliferated.
languages.original_text: Богадельни, развернутые по приказу Вольного Торговца, спасали от смерти голодных и лишенных крова. К сожалению, они же нарушили хрупкую экосистему станции — более не вымерзающая в пустых отсеках и не терзаемая эпидемиями нищета расползлась по Футфолу, став рассадником преступности — диких банд анверов, торговцев органами, нелегальных мастеров аугментов.

traits.locale_text: Poorhouses opened by the order of the Rogue Trader saved many hungry and homeless from death. Unfortunately, this broke the delicate ecosystem of the station. Beggary, no longer freezing to death in the empty compartments, or tormented by epidemics, spread around Footfall and became the nursery for the crime: savage gangs of Anvers, organ traders, and illegal augmentic specialists.

Poorhouses opened by the order of the Rogue Trader saved many hungry and homeless from death. Unfortunately, this broke the delicate ecosystem of the station. Beggary, no longer freezing to death in the empty compartments, or tormented by epidemics, spread around Footfall and became the nursery for the crime: savage gangs of Anvers, organ traders, and illegal augmentic specialists.

No longer freezing to death in empty compartments or tormented by epidemics, those who lived in poverty on Footfall began to choke the station, leading to a sharp rise in crime: organ traders, illegal augmetic specialists, and savage gangs of Anvers proliferated.

No longer freezing to death in empty compartments or tormented by epidemics, those who lived in poverty on Footfall began to choke the station, leading to a sharp rise in crime: organ traders, illegal augmetic specialists, and savage gangs of Anvers proliferated.

Poorhouses opened by the order of the Rogue Trader saved many hungry and homeless from death. Unfortunately, this disrupted the station's delicate ecosystem. No longer freezing to death in empty compartments or tormented by epidemics, those who lived in poverty on Footfall began to choke the station, leading to a sharp rise in crime: organ traders, illegal augmetic specialists, and savage gangs of Anvers proliferated.

languages.text: 行商浪人下令开办的救济院拯救了许多饥饿和无家可归的人，使他们免于死亡。但遗憾的是，这样的善举扰乱了星站脆弱的生态系统。那些生活在落脚港的贫困人口不再会冻死在空荡荡的隔间里，也不再会受传染病的折磨，这些多余的人超出了星站的承载能力，犯罪率也开始飙升。人体器官贩子、非法植入物专家，以及野蛮的安维尔帮成员数量都在飞速增长。
languages.original_text: Poorhouses opened by the order of the Rogue Trader saved many hungry and homeless from death. Unfortunately, this disrupted the station's delicate ecosystem. No longer freezing to death in empty compartments or tormented by epidemics, those who lived in poverty on Footfall began to choke the station, leading to a sharp rise in crime: organ traders, illegal augmetic specialists, and savage gangs of Anvers proliferated.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人下令开办的救济院拯救了许多饥饿和无家可归的人，使他们免于死亡。但遗憾的是，这样的善举破坏了星站脆弱的生态系统。那些生活在落脚港的贫困人口不再会冻死在空荡荡的隔间里，也不再会受传染病的折磨，这些多余的人超出了星站的承载能力，犯罪率也开始飙升。人体器官贩子、非法植入物专家，以及野蛮的安维尔帮成员数量都在飞速增长。

languages.text: Armenhäuser die auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gegründet wurden, retteten viele Hungrige und Obdachlose vor dem Tod. Leider wurde das delikate Ökosystem der Station dadurch zerstört. Die ärmsten Bewohner von Footfall erfroren nicht mehr in leeren Modulen und wurden nicht mehr von Epidemien dahingerafft. Stattdessen verstopften sie die Station, was zu einem dramatischen Anstieg der Kriminalität führte: Organhändler, Spezialisten für illegale Augmentationen und brutale Anvers-Gangs schossen aus dem Boden.
languages.original_text: Poorhouses opened by the order of the Rogue Trader saved many hungry and homeless from death. Unfortunately, this disrupted the station's delicate ecosystem. No longer freezing to death in empty compartments or tormented by epidemics, those who lived in poverty on Footfall began to choke the station, leading to a sharp rise in crime: organ traders, illegal augmetic specialists, and savage gangs of Anvers proliferated.

traits.locale_text: Armenhäuser die auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gegründet wurden, retteten viele Hungrige und Obdachlose vor dem Tod. Leider wurde das delikate Ökosystem der Station dadurch zerstört. Die ärmsten Bewohner von Footfall erfroren nicht mehr in leeren Modulen und wurden nicht mehr von Epidemien dahingerafft. Stattdessen verstopften sie die Station, was zu einem dramatischen Anstieg der Kriminalität führte: Organhändler, Spezialisten für illegale Augmentationen und brutale Anvers-Gangs schossen aus dem Boden.

languages.text: Les refuges ouverts sur ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} secoururent de nombreux affamés et sans-abri, mais ces mesures bienveillantes perturbèrent l'écosystème délicat de Castel. Les nécessiteux, qui ne mouraient plus de froid ou de maladies dans des compartiments vides, submergèrent la station. La criminalité monta en flèche et les passeurs d'organes, les trafiquants d'augmétiques illégaux et les gangs violents des Anver proliférèrent.
languages.original_text: Poorhouses opened by the order of the Rogue Trader saved many hungry and homeless from death. Unfortunately, this disrupted the station's delicate ecosystem. No longer freezing to death in empty compartments or tormented by epidemics, those who lived in poverty on Footfall began to choke the station, leading to a sharp rise in crime: organ traders, illegal augmetic specialists, and savage gangs of Anvers proliferated.

traits.locale_text: Les refuges ouverts sur ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} secoururent de nombreux affamés et sans-abri, mais ces mesures bienveillantes brisèrent l'écosystème délicat de Castel. Les nécessiteux, qui ne mouraient plus de froid ou de maladies dans des compartiments vides, surpeuplèrent la station. La criminalité monta en flèche et les passeurs d'organes, les trafiquants d’augmétiques illégaux et les gangs violents des Anver proliférèrent.

languages.text: Los hospicios abiertos por orden de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente salvaron de la muerte a un gran número de personas hambrientas y sin hogar. Lamentablemente, eso rompió el delicado ecosistema de la estación. Ahora que no temían morir congelados en compartimentos vacíos ni sucumbir a las epidemias, los pobres de Paso comenzaron a estrangular la estación a través de un marcado incremento en la delincuencia: el comercio de órganos, los especialistas en auméticos ilegales y las bandas de Anvers se multiplicaron.
languages.original_text: Poorhouses opened by the order of the Rogue Trader saved many hungry and homeless from death. Unfortunately, this disrupted the station's delicate ecosystem. No longer freezing to death in empty compartments or tormented by epidemics, those who lived in poverty on Footfall began to choke the station, leading to a sharp rise in crime: organ traders, illegal augmetic specialists, and savage gangs of Anvers proliferated.

traits.locale_text: Los hospicios abiertos por orden de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente salvaron de la muerte a un gran número de personas hambrientas y sin hogar. Lamentablemente, eso rompió el delicado ecosistema de la estación. Ahora que no temían morir congelados en compartimentos vacíos ni sucumbir a las epidemias, los pobres de Paso comenzaron a estrangular la estación a través de un marcado incremento en la delincuencia: el comercio de órganos, los especialistas en auméticos ilegales y las bandas de Anvers se multiplicaron.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の命令で開設された救貧院は、多くの飢えた人々やホームレスを死から救った。残念なことに、これはステーションの繊細な生態系を乱してしまった。空っぽの区画で凍え死ぬことも、伝染病に苦しめられることもなくなり、フットフォールで貧困にあえぐ人々は次第にステーションを圧迫し始め、犯罪の急増につながった…臓器売買業者、違法なオーグメティック専門家、アンヴァースの野蛮なギャングが急増した。
languages.original_text: Poorhouses opened by the order of the Rogue Trader saved many hungry and homeless from death. Unfortunately, this disrupted the station's delicate ecosystem. No longer freezing to death in empty compartments or tormented by epidemics, those who lived in poverty on Footfall began to choke the station, leading to a sharp rise in crime: organ traders, illegal augmetic specialists, and savage gangs of Anvers proliferated.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの命令で開設された救貧院は、多くの飢えた人々やホームレスを死から救った。残念なことに、これはステーションの繊細な生態系を壊してしまった。空っぽの区画で凍え死ぬことも、伝染病に苦しめられることもなくなり、フットフォールで貧困にあえぐ人々は次第にステーションを圧迫し始め、犯罪の急増につながった…臓器売買業者、違法なオーグメティック専門家、アンヴァースの野蛮なギャングが急増した。

languages.text: Açılmaları Hür Tacir tarafından emredilen düşkünlerevleri sayısız aç ve evsizi ölümden kurtardı ancak maalesef bu durum, istasyonun hassas ekosistemini bozdu. Boş kompartımanlarda donarak ölmeyen veya salgınlarda telef olmayan Binliman'ın fakir halkı, istasyonu boğmaya başladı ve suç oranlarında ciddi bir artış meydana geldi: Organ tacirlerine, yasa dışı ogmetik uzmanlarına ve vahşi Anver çetelerine gün doğdu.
languages.original_text: Poorhouses opened by the order of the Rogue Trader saved many hungry and homeless from death. Unfortunately, this disrupted the station's delicate ecosystem. No longer freezing to death in empty compartments or tormented by epidemics, those who lived in poverty on Footfall began to choke the station, leading to a sharp rise in crime: organ traders, illegal augmetic specialists, and savage gangs of Anvers proliferated.

Boş kompartımanlarda donarak ölmeyen veya salgınlarda telef olmayan Binliman'ın fakir halkı, istasyonu boğmaya başladı ve suç oranlarında ciddi bir artış meydana geldi: Organ tacirlerine, yasa dışı ogmetik uzmanlarına ve vahşi Anver çetelerine gün doğdu.

languages.translation_comment: Повелели изменить жизнь на Футфоле в хоуп
